* Main class of Duke, a personal assistant chatbot.
* Executes a command based on the user input and returns a corresponding message.
* Returns if the {@code Command} is an application terminating command.
* @return {@code True} if user input is an exit command, {@code False} otherwise.
* Returns a String representation of {@code DukeException} in display format.

* Command to exit the chatbot application.
* Adds the given task to the {@code TaskList}, and returns a success message.
return Ui.formatMessages(new String[]{"Bye. Hope to see you again soon!"});
* Abstract superclass of a command that can be executed upon user request.
* Sets the TaskList object that all commands use.
* @throws DukeException Checked exceptions that may occur during command execution.
public abstract String execute() throws DukeException;
